name: Dreamwood Edge
description: Dreamwood Edge is a realm on the outskirts of the Fairy Enclave.  It is filled with tall trees in mystical colors. Twinkling Firefly flock the sky, creating an enchanting glow which illuminates the area. The air here is filled with a mystic hum that touches everything around.

travel_descriptions.in: From the Dreamwood Edge, you venture deeper into the forest, drawn by the increasingly vibrant glow punctuating the foliage. As the magical hum intensifies, mirroring the crescendo of fairy laughter and steadily growing radiance, you re-enter the pulsing heart of the Fairy Enclave.
